Description:
February Enrichment Week 4: It's time for the Grand Finale 🏆 💖

This week, each dog will engage with a potential playmate before finally meeting snout-to-snout! Each pup is then invited to strut their stuff down our red carpet and fight for the chance to be the 'Love Unleashed' Ultimate Canine Couple! 🐾🐕

Here's what activities are on the menu:
🐾 Build Your Love Potion –
Feel the magic with a love potion mixer.
🐾 Rose Petal Pit –
Dig through the roses to find the treat.
🐾 Secret Admirer Gift –
Solve a puzzle from your potential match.
🐾 Paw Painting Together –
Valentine-themed paw painting in pairs.
🐾 Heart-Shaped Relay –
A romantic quest to collect the most hearts.

Will it be love at first sniff? Sign up for 'Love Unleashed' to join in our activities and fill your life with puppy love 💖 

#OnCloudCanine #DoggyDaycare #PetSitting #AkronOH #DogTraining #DogGrooming #FearFree #DogEnrichment #EnrichmentDaycare #EnrichmentForDogs #LoveUnleashed

Account name: On Cloud Canine LLC | Fear Free Certified Professionals
Description:
🌟 Employee Spotlight 🌟 A pawsome addition to our pack: Jenna! 

Jenna has been dedicated to animals since she was young, helping care for foster pets and standing strong against animal testing. In 2017, she became an assistant groomer and quickly realized her true calling!

When she’s not pampering pups, Jenna loves attending concerts, kayaking, traveling, and learning new things. At home, she’s got her hands full with her three beloved cats, Newton, Miso, and Goose, and her precious pup, Finley! 🐱🐱🐱🐶

We’re so lucky to have her as part of our team! Let's give Jenna a big round of applause for all the dedication and expertise she brings to On Cloud Canine 👏👏

#OnCloudCanine #EmployeeSpotlight #FearFree #AkronOH #DogGrooming #CatGrooming #MeetThePack #DoggyDaycare #DogTraining #PetSitting

Description:

In this lighthearted event, dogs will have the chance to “meet” other pups in a variety of fun and engaging activities, all while you enjoy the love connections from the sidelines. From playtime to a “doggy speed dating” round, we’ll help your pup find their pawfect match.

Description:
🎉 Love Unleashed is HERE! 🎉

February is here, and we’re rolling out the red carpet for your pup! 🐾❤️ Join us at On Cloud Canine for a month of Valentine’s-themed fun your dog won’t want to miss.

Here’s what’s coming up:

Feb 3-7: Meet the Stars!
We’re getting to know your pup with their own Waggr Profile, from favorite games to belly rub spots! 🐶💖

Feb 10-14: Testing Their Star Power
Your pup will take on heart-shaped obstacle courses and fun challenges to show off their skills! 🌟🎬

Feb 17-21: Wagging at First Sight (WAFS)
It’s doggy speed dating and team trick training – let’s see which pups have that special spark! 💘

Feb 24-28: The Big Reveal
The Color Blind Date challenge will crown the Ultimate Canine Couple at our Valentine’s Ball! 🏆

It’s a month full of fun, friends, and unforgettable moments. Let your pup join the adventure! 🐾 #oncloudcanine #cloudcaninecrew #doggydaycare #akronohio #fearfreepets #enrichmentdaycare #valentines #loveunleashed

Account name: On Cloud Canine LLC | Fear Free Certified Professionals
Description: This gate control is what dreams are made of! Gate control is all about teaching dogs to control their impulses when it comes to things like door dashing, jumping, and rushing out. By working on this skill, we help them learn patience and self-control, so they stay calm and well-mannered when the gates or doors open. It’s a key part of helping them make better choices in exciting situations! #oncloudcanine #cloudcaninecrew #fearfreepets #akronohio #doggydaycare #dogdaycare #enrichmentdaycare #fearfreecertified
